snippet.title: Crime Stopper walkthrough (Apple II - Hayden Software)
snippet.description:
"It's 9 AM and you phone's ringing, Al Clubs, private eye. The woman's name is Cartier-Blanche Sizemore, and she's screaming. She's got reason to scream...She's been kidnapped...Her mother wants her back, the media's on your back, and you've got 'till midnight to find her. Clues are everywhere, and some of them are traps; subways can be murder in the city. Dead ends are waiting everywhere for you."

Crime Stopper (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/crime-stopper-murder-at-midnight) was a text adventure game published by Hayden Software in 1982 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Juan Duc)
Disk image - 4AM
